title: His Every Move
description: For His Pleasure is a New York Times and USA Today bestselling series, and with each new book, the romance only gets hotter... Kallie Young has finally given herself over to Hunter Reardon. But that doesn't stop Hunter from having his cake and eating it too. Because Hunter is seeing another woman, and he doesn't mind throwing it in Kallie's face. Seething with rage, Kallie decides to end it with the rebellious bad boy once and for all. But when Kallie's confronted with the truth behind the mysterious woman and Hunter's relationship to her, nothing will ever be the same. Because there are greater perils lurking in Hunter's past than Kallie could ever imagine in her wildest dreams.  In the end, Kallie may just find that Hunter Reardon is nothing she thought he was, and everything she needs him to be. His Every Move (For His Pleasure, Book 9) is a 30,000 word tale of lust, submission, power and ultimately--a love story for the ages.
author: Kelly Favor
